title: Bug 109718: Put large content in text item, the tips shows the content in one line
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put the mouse on the text item

Expected Result: The tips should be shown in the given format

OB: The tips for the text item are displayed in a single line instead of the expected format

SR:

4. Put the mouse on the text item to view the tips
